endpoints.title: búqueda básica coordenades de Alicante
endpoints.description: Geographical WGS84 coordinates of the location. Multiple coordinates can be comma separated. E.g. &latitude=52.52,48.85&longitude=13.41,2.35. To return data for multiple locations the JSON output changes to a list of structures. CSV and XLSX formats add a column location_id. For North and South America locations use negative longitudes, because they lie west of Greenwich.
